Field Detail

X_TRANSLATION

private static final double X_TRANSLATION
A point in the world is chosen to be the origin (0,0) of the meter-based coordinate frame. By default the origin is the location of the Intel Research lab in Seattle. These coords can be changed to be something nearby your location for convenience sake. The reason to pick something close to home is because the x and y coordinates in meters will be small (like 150, or 1500 rather than 43987593457) and it make it easier to reason about the correctness of what you're doing.

See Also:
